FlavorTextOption.Text: Our survey teams have noticed a strange subspace wave. It has been opening spacetime rifts that are dropping extremely valuable artifact anomalies across the galaxy.
Allow our survey ships to continue their research and keep us informed. [COLOR=BenevolentBlue](Benevolent +15)[/COLOR]
Tell our survey teams to focus on finding these artifacts above all else. [COLOR=PragmaticGold](Pragmatic +15)[/COLOR]
Assign some armed escorts to our survey ships to discourage others from interfering with our investigations. [COLOR=WarRed](Malevolent +15)[/COLOR]
